alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Harris County through 530 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hilshire Village, or over Spring Valley. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Spring Branch West, Spring Valley, Spring Branch North, western Memorial Park, Afton Oaks / River Oaks Area, southeastern Addicks Park Ten, Hedwig Village, Hilshire Village, Spring Branch East, Spring Branch Central, Greater Uptown, Westbranch, Fairbanks / Northwest Crossing, Langwood, The Galleria, Carverdale and Lazybrook / Timbergrove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
